body:
Hia, people know me as vsplesk101... well call me Max :P. So i have a pack ready for people! And it is a 16x16 edit for people that don't have necessarily good PC's. It took me a while to make this.. even tho it doesn't seem like it, I really ain't used to making 16x packs.. But i think it came out good. :P But anyways lets get right into it:
Downloads:

Ultra Version                        Flares, 64x edited 16x16 swords         Version 0.9
Multi-Purpose version (Coming soon)             Pot, Soup, Standard, Custom
Standard                                                Version 0.9                                             

Images:

Standard

Credit: 

Inventory: Pot PVP pack
Swords: Me
Particles: Me
Bow: Me
Creative inventory: Huahwi's 64x Defscape edit
Hotbar: xKingy's 16x Edit #2 (I think)
Cursor, Hearts, and Food bar: Me

Enjoy! :3

title: Max's Default (16x) edit! Is finally here!

replies.body: Looks awesome. Hope it doesn't lag later when I try :P
replies.body_tagged: Looks awesome. Hope it doesn't lag later when I try :P

replies.body:
This is pretty cool.
Unfortunately I'll be sticking to my custom t-pack, but I'm sure many people will enjoy this. Cheers! :D
